name: ℧ Suit of Cups ℧
description: The Suit of Cups, sometimes also called Vessels, or Hearts, is the suit that represents Elemental Water, whose symbol is ∇.$(br)  As such, it relates to feelings, imagination, fantasy, mysticism, reflection, receptivity, melancholy, flow, emotion, and the soul.$(br)  The Cup of the Magician is the Power to Dare.
